message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $200. I believe it's a great deal and will be valuable to you.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value.
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest.  While $120 is a bit low for what I'm looking for, I'm willing to come down to $170.  I believe this product will really benefit you and it's a fair compromise.
Hi Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I was thinking of making a counteroffer of $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget.
